price: “Ntimugahuguze abantu mugabanya ku byabo, kandi ntimugakwize ubwangizi ku isi.”
arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
